name: Make a Beat
content: Oh yeah come let's get shakey now
Have fun is whats it all about
Dooo No matter where you are
Dooo I'm gonna show you how
未怕伤心 未怕艰辛 我这一生
是对的 便会等 就算天色再沉
继续唱 我要继续跳
只知道冇野比你地更重要
Dooo 新的气派 独有气势未见怪
Dooo So move your body next to mine
Dooo And we'll enjoy the night
任咪高峰 任扩音机 跳升音阶
